website_summaries.verdict: This huge LEGO set is the ultimate model for hardcore Batman fans, who will enjoy taking their time to recreate the Batcave and playing superheroes long after it’s complete.
pros: Build the legendary Batcave, with many areas, like the Batcomputer and weapons room, huge Clayface villain, and Bat-Tank
Includes Batman, Robin, Catwoman, and more
cons: A fairly expensive, but impressive LEGO set

customer_reviews.title: a crap ton of pieces and work
customer_reviews.text: Was an absolute blast to build and add to my DC collection
customer_reviews.author: Billy boy

customer_reviews.title: Jacobs legod
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has gotten legod as far as I can remember
customer_reviews.author: diana smith

customer_reviews.title: Lego set
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and was well packaged. As for the Lego's, we will love this selection for sure
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Box was damaged and pieces missing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons birthday. We told him he had to wait to build it and now we feel horrible. It’s past the return date and we just started it and realized it is missing half the pieces. It obviously had tape on the box and only 2 of the 6 figurines are even in the box and he is so bummed. A few bags of legos obviously are missing and we just figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Dena M. Webster

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas present ever
customer_reviews.text: My grandson just love it no problem putting it together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great leggo set
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Great product description. Received exactly what we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kyser

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: What more can I say?! It’s legos! Such a great set! This set is a little more challenging to put together, but definitely fun. Every piece fits perfectly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: IAmanonymous

customer_reviews.title: Batman + LEGO = Weekend Entertainment
customer_reviews.text: The 6-year old grandson worked on this LEGO set, featuring Batman. The 8+ age on the box seems adequate, as the grandson did need some assistance. However, the booklet walked us through the assembly step-by-step. It has a couple of main components to assemble, a tank, villain, and Batcave. His favorite item was the Batcave with many areas/rooms. You get 6 LEGO minifigures - Batman, Bruce Wayne, Robin, Batwoman, Catwoman and Two-Face + a large villain.
customer_reviews.author: BBMoreB

customer_reviews.title: Have patience on the build -- but a great set!
customer_reviews.text: This lego set is not for the faint of heart! Our kiddo is 6 and loved the idea of building the set, but needed a good amount of grown-up help -- which I don't fault lego for, since the box labels it 8+! I'd guess even some 8-9 year olds might need help finishing this one since there are a ton of tiny pieces. But the set itself is great. Loved all the figurines, our two kids usually fight over those when it only comes with one or two. Lots of interactive features with the cave, bat tank, and clay face. Not just for hardcore Batman fans, but those who are fans will get some extra love out of this!
customer_reviews.author: NY to VA

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for young and not-so-young alike
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids came over and we all put this set together. We all love Lego's and this set did not disappoint. I was impressed with the mini-figures. When first looking at the instructions it can be a tad bit scary. Just follow the steps in order and before you know it ( OK a couple of hours maybe ) you have it built. Lego keeps turning out cool sets. I got my first set over 40 years ago and still enjoy them. The grandkids and even their mom enjoy building new sets. This set did not disappoint. I think the Batman or Lego fan in your family will like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Coates

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lego Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing Lego set!! I'm not sure who had more fun with this, my husband or my 21 year old son. The details are incredible. It took the two of them a couple of hours to build it. It also led to a lot of Batman discussions between them. The set comes with 7 mini figs plus Clayface. This set might be a little challenging for younger builders, so help may be required. The directions were easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: LVesper

customer_reviews.title: Imaginative play
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun lego set. It includes 6 figures: Bruce Wayne, Batman, Catwoman, Robin, Batwoman, and Two-Face. It also has a huge, posable Clayface. There are several different play zones including a jail break feature. There are so many ways to play with this set and it is a great way to get kids off from screen time and using their imaginations to be heroes that save the day. At the time of this review, the retail price was just under $100 which is reasonable for the quality and the size of this set which includes over 1k pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jean K

customer_reviews.title: Must have for LEGO Batman fan
customer_reviews.text: Grew up reading DC comics and the dark knight has always been one of my favorite. When I saw this set it was a must. Has Bruce Wayne that go down the secret drop to release the Batman, pretty cool. Has all the original classic characters, Robin, cat woman, two face etc. if you like legos and a big Batman fan this is a must have set.
customer_reviews.author: Shark Bait

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is like 5 sets in one. My 5 year old loved putting it together, mostly by himself!, and continue to love to play with it. There's a lot of details and parts, but because it's more like multiple sets rather than one big one, there's a lot of small wins and everything seems to have fairly visible wins. The design and details are really great to see come together and my son to show off.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick O

customer_reviews.title: Fun Batman Build
customer_reviews.text: This is a great interactive Lego kit for Batman fans. It’s got a lot of detail and is totally fun to build-lot’s of pieces! The imagination that goes into these kits is amazing and this bat cave does not disappoint! This was so much fun to build and I highly recommend to any Lego plus Batman fan! Awesome build for kids and adults or both!
customer_reviews.author: C. Irish

customer_reviews.title: A must for the Lego collection
customer_reviews.text: It's Batman and Lego, form the movie "K" What a great set. I ordered as a gift for my grandson, and his father who both love the Lego movie, and Lego and Batman. But who dosn't? A bit pricey but to get this kind of set it is worth it. Reminiscent of the great star Wars sets. You will spend days building everything :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: like any Lego kit... always a HIT!
customer_reviews.text: my son loves Legos' of any kind so of course he loved putting together the Batcave! The characters are really cute and the set itself is just fun. Not too advanced but not a beginner kit either, but for Batman and Lego fans it's a 'must have'
customer_reviews.author: C. Dionne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality like most Lego items. Lots of play time involved. Was great fun for my friend's 10 year old. He worked on putting it together for 4 hours then had a couple more hours of playtime. He has went back daily to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps the best set yet
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love lego sets and this one is huge... takes quite a while to build, but isn't that the point? Once built, enjoy the action. Fun for all ages (note: some VERY small parts). Excellent detail!
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: Batman lovers yessss
customer_reviews.text: So cool!! Always a lego fan- My husband and 4yo :D we have the batmobile LEGO set and that was cool and they play with both that and this set together Any Batman fan young or old, boy or girl would love this!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Lego Continues their Quality
customer_reviews.text: Another outstanding theme and set. Grandkids love building these things. Batman is a winner and the detail and workmanship continue to be above all. Great set.
customer_reviews.author: Kug

customer_reviews.title: This is a favorite - Batman and Lego.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. This is a building kit based on Batman, which is always popular around here. One of our favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Bold Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Fun LEGO set for any Batman fan
customer_reviews.text: Another great set from LEGO, especially if you are a fan of Batman. Hours of fun creating and playing with this set.
customer_reviews.author: sfdk

customer_reviews.title: Fun time for my 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of my son's favorite sets to date, he loves Batman and had a blast putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Dinosaurs and Mermaids, mom of both

product_meta.title: LEGO DC Batman Batcave Clayface Invasion 76122 Batman Toy Building Kit with Batman and Bruce Wayne Action Minifigures, Popular DC Superhero Toy (1037 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Inspire kids to create their own thrilling stories with this 1,037-piece LEGO DC Batman 76122 Batcave Clayface Invasion construction toy. The collectible Batcave model is packed with play-starting features and functions including a Batcomputer zone, detachable transformation tower with a function to ‘transform’ the LEGO Bruce Wayne minifigure into Batman and a detachable jail building with an explode function to play out a prison break. This Batman toy playset also includes the Bat-Tank with a rotating turret with 4 flick missiles, plus a stud shooter and hook shooter, each of which can be detached and used as minifigure weapons. Children can also get creative by using the included Action Pack elements and Bat Family Pack elements to customize builds, minifigures and weapons. And with 6 minifigures—including Batwoman and Two-Face—plus a posable, big build Clayface figure, this cool kids’ toy is the best super-hero gift for Batman fans.
feature_bullets: Build Batman’s Batcave with a Batcomputer zone, weapons room, trophy room, and detachable transformation tower and jail modules, plus the Bat-Tank for super hero vs. Super Villain role-play action!

This super-hero toy playset includes Batman, Bruce Wayne, Robin, Batwoman, Catwoman and Two-Face minifigures, a posable big build Clayface figure, plus Action Pack and Bat Family Pack elements to customize builds, minifigures and weapons

LEGO Batcave detachable prison and transformation tower measures over 8” (22cm) high, 16” (43cm) wide and 3” (9cm) deep Bat-Tank measures over 3” (8cm) high, 3” (8cm) long and 2” (7cm) wide Buildable Clayface figure stands over 4” (12cm) tall
1,037 pieces – Collectible Batcave playset that makes a great birthday gift for boys and girls aged 8+ and for fans and big kids of all ages
This LEGO DC Batman Batcave Clayface Invasion 76122 super-hero playset can be built together with all other original LEGO construction toys and LEGO bricks for creative play

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars175 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
